channel.title: Personal on Alterscope Solutions LLC
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Alterscope Solutions LLC

item.title: About
item.description: Alterscope Solutions was founded by Matt in 2021 to bring new ideas to life and to try to improve the daily lives of a large number of people. I’m a full time sysadmin with app development as my side hustle. I really do enjoy writing code and bringing ideas to life, or else I wouldn’t be writing this at 11pm. If you have an idea for an app that maybe you’d like to share, please let me know on the contact form.
